Andrew is an excellent animator and motion designer.  I have hired him multiple times for projects both large and small.  He is located in Canada, but it's like we are in the same office with Dropbox and video chat.  He works extremely hard and puts in long days / weekends and always produces great results.  Andrew is also very up on new technologies and constantly exploring new styles.  I highly recommend using him on your next motion project.

summary: Justin Katz is a ten-time Emmy® Award winning motion design director, producer and editor at Flock of Pixels. With a BFA in Film & Animation from RIT, a career start in brand identity at Landor, and an ad agency education from JWT--he later headed out west on a whim to start Flock of Pixels. Justin often gives talks on motion design around the country and founded MGPHX. His client list includes: AIGA, Apple, American Express, ASU, Brand New Conference, Canon, Coca-Cola, Coldstone, Cox, Del Monte, Goodwill, Honda, iGo, Insight, Kibbles n Bits, Kotex, LeadMD, Lulan, Massage Envy, Milk-bone, Phoenix Coyotes, Prisma, Sylvan Learning, & Taser to name a few. Justin is currently working while exploring the world, but spends most of his time in Phoenix & New York. He also eats way too many burritos.~~~~~~~~~~ PRESS ~~~~~~~~~~~http://blogs.phoenixnewtimes.com/jackalope/2012/12/justin_katz_flock_of_pixels_video_animation_post_production_emmy_phoenix.phphttp://blogs.phoenixnewtimes.com/jackalope/2013/03/big_brain_2013_finalists_new_times.phphttp://www.leadmd.com/Flock-of-Pixels-Nabs-Double-Emmy-Win-for-Video-with-LeadMDhttp://aigasf.org/events/2012/02/16/interactive_chats_motion_designhttp://designenvy.aiga.org/curator/?user_id=92http://www.redgiant.com/blog/2011/07/05/in-a-tight-spot-for-the-coyotes/http://www.redgiant.com/blog/2010/11/09/project-breakdown-the-brand-new-conference/
